channel.title: Writings of Patrick Forringer
channel.description: Pellentesque odio nisi, euismod in, pharetra a, ultricies in, diam. Sed arcu.

item.title: Nothing
item.description: What will we want when there is nothing left for us to make what we want?
item.content:encoded:
What will we want when there is nothing left for us to make what we want?

What if we keep taking when what we take from screams in agony with every gouge?

The screams are delayed, so we do not hear them.

Where will we go when there is no safe place to go?

How will we sleep if there is nowhere left to call home?

item.title: Readme
item.description: For many years I've not kept a blog type web-presense, that may start to change.
item.content:encoded:
This is the first post after setting up gatsby and customizing a starter package. Gatsby feels so hilariously over complex for solving the static site problem. I’ve already ran into a few issues when attempting to extent some of the site config and how it’s represented in the graphql queries. Nothing too complex.

The plan is to start writing more about different topics that I care about and see if others are interested in reading along.

There will heopfully be a wide range. We’ll see what happens.
